# minimumAllowedCPUCount

**Type Property**

The minimum number of CPUs you may configure for the VM.

## Declaration

```swift
class var minimumAllowedCPUCount: Int { get }
```

## Discussion

The value in the [doc://com.apple.virtualization/documentation/Virtualization/VZVirtualMachineConfiguration/cpuCount] property must be greater than or equal to the value in this property.

## Setting the number of CPUs

- **cpuCount**: The number of CPUs you make available to the guest operating system.
- **maximumAllowedCPUCount**: The maximum number of CPUs you may configure for the VM.
